name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: timeMillis
description: Time in milliseconds for the time spent answering the question

name: correct
description: Whether the answer is correct or not

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDATUTORIAL.TestAnswer)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDATUTORIAL.TestAnswer)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDATUTORIAL.TestAnswer)
